entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Temiscouata
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:26 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending this evening then partly cloudy. Local blowing snow this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 10.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning late in the evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
